definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Qinzhou is a hopeful and dynamic development of open land.
sentences.chinese: 秦州是一片充满希望与活力的开放开发热土。

sentences.english: Today's Africa, already was a hot earth that is full of opportunity of survival and hope.
sentences.chinese: 今天的非洲，已是一片充满生机和希望的热土。

sentences.english: We're all in this together, we all need to work together for equality.
sentences.chinese: 我们同在一片热土上，我们需要一起为平等而努力。

sentences.english: We loved this piece of land at the foot.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱着脚下的这片热土。

sentences.english: Qixi a is a lifeful pl a ce, full of hope.
sentences.chinese: 栖霞是一片充满生机和希望的投资热土。

sentences.english: Kansas is hardly a hotbed of eco-activism.
sentences.chinese: 堪萨斯州算不上生态主义的热土。

sentences.english: Today, this piece of land of has long been turned upside down, hustle and bustle.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这片热土早已是天翻地覆，龙腾虎跃。

sentences.english: It is the modern star city Jiangsu Zhangjiagang City , Changsheng Co. is located on the flourishing land.
sentences.chinese: 昌盛公司就座落在这块日益繁荣的热土上。

sentences.english: Fuzhou is the wonder land for Chinese lacquer art.
sentences.chinese: 福州是中国漆艺成长的热土。

sentences.english: On the magical land of Yueyang with thousand years of civilization.
sentences.chinese: 在岳州这片承载千年文明神奇热土上。

definition: illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
to take root/to establish a base
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)
(Buddhism) Pure Land, usually refers to Amitabha Buddha's Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss (Sukhavati in Sanskrit)
